name: Parasitic
description:
Crashed on an alien world (Earth), our hero must take control of various animals to stay safe.  Use your host animals to knock down trees (bear), jump high (frog), or climb to new heights (squirrel) with the jump/action button ("A" on XBox controller or spacebar).  Leave your host behind in search of a new body ("X" on XBox controller or left ctrl).  Careful, as you can only live for a few moments outside of a body.

Notes:  

A level designer was also built that can make levels using any .png editor, but is not available.  Also, only 1 stage currently exists.

Some bugs still exist, especially in the death animations.  These may get updated.

Game made for Global Game Jam 2018 (theme: Transmission) with artist Ryan Winzen.
